Title: Obi urges immediate action after Kaduna church abductions, “Enough Is Enough”
Summary: Peter Obi urges immediate action after Kaduna church abductions, “Enough Is Enough” Former presidential candidate Peter Obi has called for urgent and decisive action following the confirmed abduction of over 150 worshippers from churches in Kaduna .

Title: Osun APC, Accord bicker over Adeleke’s  teachers’ recruitment
Summary: Osun State chapter of APC and Accord Party traded words over planned recruitment of teachers . Governor Ademola Adeleke had directed the state Commissioner for Education, Dipo Eluwole, to issue appointment letters to the teachers .

Title: Lagos CP leads raid on kidnappers’ hideout, apprehends 13
Summary: Lagos CP leads raid on kidnappers’ hideout, apprehends 13 . Mr Olohundare Jimoh led operatives in a raid on a criminal hideout at Pipeline Road in the Idimu area .

Title: CBN unveils new industry-wide war on e-fraud
Summary: Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) unveils industry-wide offensive against rising digital fraud . CBN aims to reduce fraud response time to under 30 minutes .

Title: Banks record 51% fall in fraud losses to N25.9 billion
Summary: Banks record 51% fall in fraud losses to N25.85 billion, down from N52.26 billion in 2024 . Banks and other financial institutions recorded a 51 per cent year-on-year decline .

Summary: Atiku Abubakar has condemned the recent bandit attacks in Kajuru, Kaduna State, warning that peace deals with the criminals often favour the perpetrators over the victims . Title: EU grants €557m to Nigeria, others from €1.9bn 2026 budget
Summary: The EU announced a grant of 557 million euros in humanitarian aid to African countries for the 2026 budget . The amount excluded a separate 14.6 million euros allocated to North Africa . The EU’s announcement came at a time when 239 million people need assistance .

Title: Peter Obi urges action after Kaduna abduction
Summary: Peter Obi has called on authorities to take decisive action following the confirmed abduction of worshippers from churches in Kurmin Wali, Kajuru Local Government Area of Kaduna State . Obi questioned the initial denials of the incident and criticised the handling of information by security authorities . The former presidential candidate stressed the urgency of securing the victims .
